definition: demanding attention, a particular point in time
details:
adjective
- demanding attention
= synonyms: insistent
- in or of the present month
= synonyms: inst
- occurring with no delay
= synonyms: instantaneous
noun
- a particular point in time
= synonyms: second
- a very short time, such as the time it takes the eye to blink or the heart to beat
= example: a very short time, such as the time it takes the eye to blink or the heart to beat
= synonyms: wink
